market_entry.name: Community Dashboard Editor
market_entry.description:
The Community Dashboard Editor (CDE) is the outcome of real-world needs: It was born to greatly simplify the creation, edition and rendering of dashboards.
CDE and the technology underneath (CDF, CDA and CCC) allows to develop and deploy dashboards in the Pentaho platform in a fast and effective way.
market_entry.author: WebDetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here....

market_entry.name: Community Data Access
market_entry.description: Community Data Access (CDA) is a Pentaho plugin designed for accessing data with great flexibility. Born for overcoming some cons of the older implementation, CDA allows you to access any of the various Pentaho data sources.
market_entry.author: WebDetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Community Dashboards Framework
market_entry.description: Community Dashboards Framework (CDF) is a Pentaho plugin designed for drawing dashboards.
market_entry.author: WebDetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Community Graphics Generator
market_entry.description: Community Graphics Generator (CGG) is a Pentaho plugin designed for rendering CCC charts serverside, enabling you to embed them into Pentaho Reports.
market_entry.author: WebDetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Community Data Validation
market_entry.description: n the words of one of the wise men who are still around: "Our business isn't displaying stats, ours is the confidence business". The system we created to instantly detect and report data related errors, CDV, is key to achieve absolute accuracy in the numbers our dashboards display.
market_entry.author: WebDetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Community Data Browser
market_entry.description: Calling Business Analysts! Now you can Slice and Dice your Data directly from Pentaho. Make your own analysis in an autonomous and easy way.
market_entry.author: WebDetails

market_entry.name: Community Distributed Cache
market_entry.description: CDC stands for Community Distributed Cache and allows for high-performance, scalable and distributed memory clustering cache based on Hazelcast for both CDA and Mondrian.
market_entry.author: WebDetails
market_entry.installation_notes: Please remember to copy the contents of system/cdc/pentaho-lib to webapps/pentaho/WEB-INF/lib.

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Saiku Analytics
market_entry.description: Saiku is a modular open-source analysis suite offering lightweight OLAP which remains easily embeddable, extendable and configurable. Our RESTful server connects to existing OLAP systems, which then powers user-friendly, intuitive analytics via our lightweight JQuery based frontend.
market_entry.author: Analytical Labs

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Install at your own risk...

market_entry.name: OpenI-Pentaho Plugin
market_entry.description: OpenI plugin for Pentaho CE provides a simple and clean user interface to visualize data in OLAP cubes. It supports both direct Mondrian and xmla based connections like Microsoft SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS), plus provides add-on features like Explore Cube Data, custom SQL for drillthrough data, publishing drillthrough data to external web services etc
market_entry.author: OpenI

version.name: OpenI-Pentaho 3.0.1
version.description: OpenI Plugin is available on both sourceforge.net(http://sourceforge.net/projects/openi) and github(https://www.github.com/openi/)

market_entry.name: PDI MySQL Plugin
market_entry.description: This plugin also contains the GPL MySQL JDBC Driver version 5
market_entry.author: Pentaho
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a Pentaho Data Integration Enterprise Edition support contract.

market_entry.name: Apple Push Notification
market_entry.description: This is a plugin that allows to you send push notifications from Pentaho Data Integration to any iOS and OSX devices, using Apple's Push Notification Services. This plugin is written in Scala and uses the Java Apple Push Notification Service library. The motivation for developing this plugin is to have you, the ETL developer, receive quick notifications about the state of ETL executions wherever you are (faster than email). However, this plugin can be use for other scenarios as well.
market_entry.author: Joel Latino
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a PDI Apple Push Notifications github project contract.

market_entry.name: Android Push Notification
market_entry.description: This is a plugin that allows you to send push notifications from Pentaho Data Integration to any android application with GCM services. This plugin is written in Scala. The motivation for developing this plugin is to have you, the ETL developer, receive fast notifications about the state of ETL executions wherever you are (than faster email). You can use my android app named PDI Manager: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.latinojoel.pdimanager However, this plugin can be used in other scenarios as well.
market_entry.author: Joel Latino
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a PDI Android Push Notifications github project contract.

market_entry.name: Dummy step plugin
market_entry.description: This is a plugin that is provided as an example on how to create a step plugin for PDI. This plugin is intended only to show how a plugin works, it's goal is not to be used in production situations. Please consult the documentation referenced below as well as the linked source code.
market_entry.author: Pentaho
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a Pentaho Data Integration Enterprise Edition support contract.

market_entry.name: ARFF Output
market_entry.description: Saves data to a file in WEKA's ARFF (Attribute Relation File Format).
market_entry.author: Pentaho

market_entry.support_message: Supported by a Pentaho Data Integration Enterprise Edition support contract.

market_entry.name: KFF
market_entry.description: This market entry contains a number of step and jobentry plugins from the KFF project: - Table compare - Environment configurator - Data Grid (in 4.1) - ...
market_entry.author: The KFF project members: Jan, Matt, Ricardo, Alexandre, Harris, André
market_entry.license_text: For more details about the GNU General Lesser Public License v2.0 see: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.0.html
market_entry.support_message: Supported by the KFF project on a best-effort bases.

market_entry.name: DataCleaner Data Profiling for Kettle version 5 or higher
market_entry.description: Use DataCleaner to profile your Pentaho Data Integration transformations, step by step. Data Cleaner is an open source data quality application made by Human Inference. With it you can run profiling jobs using DataCleaner for any transformation step and in the database explorer. Additionally you can include and launch DataCleaner jobs as part of your PDI jobs. This allows you to merge the tasks of data quality and data integration.
market_entry.author: Human Inference - eobjects - Kasper Sørensen
market_entry.license_text: For more details about the GNU General Lesser Public License v2.0 see: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.0.html
market_entry.support_message: Professional support, training and consultancy for DataCleaner is offered by Human Inference upon request.

market_entry.name: EasyDataQuality for Pentaho
market_entry.description:
Combine the leading open source ETL tool with the leading data cleansing functions!
EasyDQ delivers on demand data quality functions that are fully integrated with Pentaho Data Integration / Kettle.
Data quality functions by Human Inference and EasyDQ available in Pentaho Data Integration:
* Data profiling (through DataCleaner) * Name cleansing * Address cleansing * Phone cleansing * Email cleansing * Detect and merge duplicates (through DataCleaner)
Register now at www.easydq.com and start increasing the quality of your data.
market_entry.author: EasyDQ - Human Inference
market_entry.license_text: To get access to EasyDQ.com and the data quality services, please register at https://www.easydq.com/register
market_entry.support_message: Please contact Human Inference Support at +31 (0)26 3550600 or email support@humaninference.com

market_entry.name: PDI Marketplace
market_entry.description: This plugin allows users to install Kettle plugins from the Pentaho Marketplace.
market_entry.author: Pentaho
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a Pentaho Data Integration Enterprise Edition support contract.

market_entry.name: CMIS Input
market_entry.description: The CMIS Input plugin make you able to extract from your Enterprise Content Management System. All the metadata of your documents can be retrieved using simple queries with a query language very close to the traditional SQL.
market_entry.author: Francesco Corti

market_entry.name: Bucket Partitioner
market_entry.description: Partitions rows based on the quotient (rather than the remainder)
market_entry.author: Matt Burgess
market_entry.license_text: For more details about the Apache v2.0 license see: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
market_entry.support_message: Supported by the Pentaho Data Integration developer community.

market_entry.name: MaxMind GeoIP Lookup
market_entry.description: This step uses the MaxMind GeoIP library to look up Countries, region and city information with an IP address.
market_entry.author: Daniel Einspanjer, Doug Moran, Pedro Alves, Matt Casters
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a community of volunteers

version.description: First stable release, supports running in Map/Reduce, handles VFS URLs for database files

market_entry.name: Weka Scoring
market_entry.description: This step allows you to push data into a Weka model and get scoring out in a transformation.
market_entry.author: Mark Hall
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a Pentaho Data Integration Enterprise Edition support contract.

market_entry.name: MDCheck
market_entry.description:
Melissa Data Contact Verification Tools:
Contact Verify Component • Standardize, verify, and correct U.S. and Canadian addresses • Verify and normalize U.S. and Canadian phones on a 7-10 digit level • Parse names, genderize, and detect suspicious words or companies in name field • Geocode addresses by assigning rooftop lat/long coordinates*
SmartMover Component • U.S./Canadian change of address processing to update addresses of people or businesses that have moved
MatchUp Component • Identify duplicate records with domain specific knowledge of contact information
IP Locator Component • Identify web visitor's geographic location • Reduce fraud and geo target
market_entry.author: Melissa Data
market_entry.license_text: To obtain a Melissa Data license please visit: http://www.melissadata.com/free-trials/pentaho.htm
market_entry.support_message: Please contact Technical Support at 1-800-800-6245 x4 or email tech@melissadata.com

market_entry.name: MDGlobalVerify
market_entry.description: Global Verify Component • Address verification for over 240 countries • Transliteration of many major character sets and display output in either nature or Roman characters
market_entry.author: Melissa Data
market_entry.license_text: To obtain a Melissa Data license please visit: http://www.melissadata.com/free-trials/pentaho.htm
market_entry.support_message: Please contact Technical Support at 1-800-800-6245 x4 or email tech@melissadata.com

market_entry.name: MDPersonator
market_entry.description: Personator Component • Verifies name corresponds to address, email, and phone data • Appends missing name and company name, phone number, and/or email address
market_entry.author: Melissa Data
market_entry.license_text: To obtain a Melissa Data license please visit: http://www.melissadata.com/free-trials/pentaho.htm
market_entry.support_message: Please contact Technical Support at 1-800-800-6245 x4 or email tech@melissadata.com

market_entry.name: Pivot4J Analytics
market_entry.description: Pivot4J provides a common API for OLAP servers which can be used to build an analytical service frontend with pivot style GUI. Pivot4J Analytics is a full fledged OLAP client application built with the Pivot4J core API, which can be used as a drop-in replacement for legacy the JPivot web application.
market_entry.author: Pivot4J Project

market_entry.name: Sparkl
market_entry.description: Sparkl, or Pentaho App Builder, is a plugin creator instrument that sits on 2 major cornerstones: Ctools and PDI, aiming to leverage as much as possible of our existing stack. Anyone familiar with those tools will be able to build plugins, facilitating adoption.
market_entry.author: WebDetails

market_entry.name: BTable
market_entry.description: BTable is a component for the Community Dashboard Designer (CDE) that extends the standard Table Component with OLAP functionalities and provides a new drill experience... drill anywhere!
market_entry.author: Biz Tech

market_entry.name: Pentaho Marketplace
market_entry.description: Provide Pentaho, Partners, and Community Developers a marketplace for plugins within the BI Server product.
market_entry.author: Pentaho

market_entry.name: WAQR
market_entry.description: WAQR (Web Adhoc Query and Reporting) is a report generation tool based on Web 2.0 technology (AJAX, DHTML) designed to help typical business users easily generate adhoc reports using the Pentaho BI platform. It provides a user interface that helps the user quickly identify and group the data of interest, apply constraints to the data, and generate a report. The resulting reports are viewable through WAQR's Preview feature, or through a Pentaho-platform based web application.
market_entry.author: Pentaho Legacy - Plugins developed by Pentaho but no longer supported

market_entry.name: PDI Tableau Data Extract Output Plugin
market_entry.description: The Tableau Data Extract plugin for Pentaho Data Integration allows you to use Pentaho's ETL capabilities to generate a Tableau Data Extract (tde) file. You can then publish the TDE file to a Tableau server or use the TDE in Tableau Desktop.
market_entry.author: OpenBI
market_entry.installation_notes:
Due to licensing the Tableau Data Extract API is not distributed through the Pentaho Marketplace and must be separately downloaded and installed using the instructions below.
1. Install the Tableau Data Exract Output plugin from the Pentaho marketplace. 2. Download the "C/C++/Java" data extract API from Tableau for your environment. Choose the 32 bit or 64 bit version based on your Java JDK. - http://www.tableausoftware.com/data-extract-api 3. Unzip the downloaded zip. 4. For PDI 5.0 and above - Copy the contents of the Java directory to ${PDI_HOME}/plugins/steps/TDEOutputPlugin directory. 5. For PDI 4.8 and below - Copy the contents of the Java6 directory to ${PDI_HOME}/plugins/steps/TDEOutputPlugin directory. 6. For Windows - Add the bin folder from the downloaded Tableau API zip to your system path variable. 7. For Linux - Add the lib folder from the downloaded Tableau API zip to the LD_LIBRARY_PATH variable. 8. Restart PDI
